title: escalated reports.
body: i feel like in order to better deal with trolls who are evading the instant feedback system., and also to cut down on the amount of report begging by the people who have "or think they have" low weight, players should get 10 "escalated" reports every 24 hours. these reports would ignore hidden weight, and if the player would be reviewed for punishment based on that report. it would trigger a manual review as opposed to by the bot. and would REQUIRE a description in the comments box

replies.body:
Most players do not even believe report weight exists.

Also, if you are reporting 10 people per day, you should be looking at yourself, not them.

Ya people report too much for so little. It's sad, we have report culture, people have forgotten that they are actually playing league of legends and they are playing their own little game called league of reports (some like to call that league of pussies but I'm not that mean hehe xd)
